header.description: ai-teched2025-group

request.description: Register an artifact for use in a configuration, for example a model or a dataset.

response.name: The artifact has been registered successfully

header.description: (Required) Specify a resource group id
Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2

description.content: URL of the registered artifact. This header is deprecated. Location header shall be used instead.

response.name: The specification of the resource was incorrect

header.description: (Required) Specify a resource group id
Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2
Specify a resource group id

variable.description: (Required) path relative to the object store root URL in the secret

request.description: Endpoint for downloading file. The path must point to an individual file.

header.description: Specify a resource group id
Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2

description.content: (Required) as per SEC-228 value should always be "nosniff"

header.description: (Required) Specify a resource group id
Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2

query.description: The max number of entries to return. Defaults to 1000. Limited to 5000 max.
The start time for the query as a RFC 3339 datetime format. Defaults to one hour ago. + in timezone need to be encoded to %2B.
The end time for the query as a RFC 3339 datetime format. Defaults to now. + in timezone need to be encoded to %2B.

Determines the sort order. Supported values are asc or desc. Defaults to asc. Sort order:
  * `asc` - Ascending, earliest in the order will appear at the top of the list
  * `desc` - Descending, last in the order will appear at the top of the list

request.description: Retrieve logs of a deployment for getting insight into the deployment results or failures.

response.name: The query was processed successfully and logs of the requested deployment will be returned.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2

query.description: The max number of entries to return. Defaults to 1000. Limited to 5000 max.
The start time for the query as a RFC 3339 datetime format. Defaults to one hour ago. + in timezone need to be encoded to %2B.
The end time for the query as a RFC 3339 datetime format. Defaults to now. + in timezone need to be encoded to %2B.

Determines the sort order. Supported values are asc or desc. Defaults to asc. Sort order:
  * `asc` - Ascending, earliest in the order will appear at the top of the list
  * `desc` - Descending, last in the order will appear at the top of the list
